Title: Statistics Netherlands (CBS) Open Data API Client
Authors@R:
c(person("Edwin", "de Jonge", email="edwindjonge@gmail.com", role = c("aut","cre")),
person("Sara", "Houweling", role=c("ctb")))
Description:
The data and meta data from Statistics
Netherlands (<https://www.cbs.nl>) can be browsed and downloaded. The client uses
the open data API of Statistics Netherlands.
Author:
Edwin de Jonge [aut, cre],
Sara Houweling [ctb]
